*Padres aren‚Äôt the clear winner since we don‚Äôt know if they will be able to keep Soto longterm. If they can they would be the winner

Acu√±a has a club option through 2028. Albies has a club option through 2027. Olson is signed through 2029 and Riley's deal includes a club option for 2033.  The Braves believe they could have a top 5 payroll soon. So, there could still be room for Fried, Swanson and others.

It was obviously time to move on from Will Smith, and Odorizzi has been pretty solid this year. Most recent start was 7 scoreless with 8K against the Mariners last night. Much needed rotation depth. Under control for 2023 as well

RHP Jake Odorizzi, 32, is 4-3 with a 3.75 ERA (3.62 FIP) and .629 OPS against in 60 IP across 12 GS for Houston this season.
